title: How do I turn on or turn off the mobile network?
answer:
Use either of the following methods: 

 Go to Settings > More > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks, and select or deselect Data enabled. 

 [In the notification panel, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111082) to enable the data service. When the data service is enabled, ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111083) changes to ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111084). To disable the data service, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111085).]()
